Description:
Open to new ideas and new ways of working.
Leverages our global expertise and knowledge.
Embraces diversity of nationalities, cultures and perspectives.
Challenges the status quo, always strives to improve and has a continuous improvement mindset.
Demonstrates a sense of personal ownership and responsibility for achieving the results of Clients and WSP.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Team leader and mentorship
Bachelor of Engineering / Science degree in (Electrical / Electronics / Telecommunication) or equivalent qualification with 12+ years post-graduate experience.
Recognized security system/ICT industry and manufacturer certifications and qualifications such as ASIS membership or such.
Proficient in systems design and project management of ICT / ELV systems, i.e., Data Networks, Video Surveillance System, Access Control, Intrusion Detection System, Physical Security measures like road blocker, bollard, etc.
Adept at MS Office.Experience of software design tools (AutoCAD, Revit, etc.).Job Details
